data.title: Dirk Paessler posted on LinkedIn
data.meta_description: Dirk Paessler posted images on LinkedIn
data.text:
We are thrilled to introduce M. Kemal Armada from Climeworks as the new President of the Negative Emissions Platform! üè´ Kemal's journey is marked by a profound dedication to sustainability and innovation. With degrees in Engineering and Energy Science from EPFL and MIT, coupled with an MBA from Harvard Business School, he brings a unique blend of technical expertise and strategic vision to NEP. üìà In his role as Head of Growth at Climeworks, a global leader in Direct Air Capture, he drives the company's growth by forging commercial and strategic partnerships and expanding its geographical reach. üìó Prior to his role at Climeworks, Kemal spent nearly eight years at McKinsey & Company, where he specialized in strategy and sustainability. His work spanned across continents, advising clients on sustainable growth strategies, carbon markets, and sustainability investing. Kemal's contributions in developing climate and carbon investment strategies, and fostering collaborations between corporates and climate tech companies, have been instrumental in shaping the landscape of sustainable business practices. ‚¨Ü We are confident that Kemal‚Äôs vision, expertise, and dedication will lead NEP to new heights as we continue our mission to combat climate change through innovative carbon removal solutions. ü§ù Please join us in welcoming Kemal to the Negative Emissions Platform!

Recently we sat down with Dirk Paessler, Founder of Paessler GmbH to hear his inspiring journey from a side project in his student flat to building a company with nearly 500 employees. Dirk shares how the principles of sustainable growth, patience, and capital efficiency were key to Paessler's success and the transformative moment when he partnered with Turn/River, bringing in fresh vision and direction to propel the company forward. Explore Dirk‚Äôs full story for insights into his entrepreneurial journey and why he chose to partner with Turn/River: https://lnkd.in/dWgfpwmS
